name: xtract_stats
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Quantitative evaluation tool of XTRACT results in neuroimaging

inputs.description: Path to microstructure folder and basename of data (e.g. /home/DTI/dti_)
inputs.name: Folder Basename

inputs.description: EITHER XTRACT results to diffusion space transform OR 'native' if tracts are already in diffusion space
inputs.name: Xtract to Diffusion Transform

inputs.description: If not 'native', provide reference image in diffusion space (e.g. /home/DTI/dti_FA)
inputs.name: Reference Image

inputs.description: Structures file (as in XTRACT) (Default is all tracts under <XTRACT_dir>)
inputs.name: Structures File

inputs.description: Threshold applied to tract probability map (default = 0.001 = 0.1%)
inputs.name: Threshold

inputs.description: Comma separated list of features to extract (Default = vol,prob,length,FA,MD - assumes DTI folder has been provided). vol = tract volume, prob = tract probability, length = tract length. Additional metrics must follow file naming conventions. e.g. for dti_L1 use 'L1'
inputs.name: Measurements

groups.description: Main parameters required to run xtract_stats
groups.name: Main Parameters

output-files.description: CSV file containing the statistics from XTRACT analysis.
output-files.name: CSV Output
